name: Shapeshifter 73
description:
Your goal in this fast paced game is to collect objects that are of the same shape or colour as your player object. However, your player object changes every now and then so keep an eye on that or you risk loosing points/lives.
Survive for as long as possible and gain lots of points.

Attribution Notice:
Soundtrack music: Hyper Ultra-Racing by Cynicmusic (http://cynicmusic.com http://pixelsphere.org)
